name: It's tire to sleep !
description:
"Little brother, let’s go, grandpa is sleeping, it’s our moment"

One brother, one sister and a treasure, their grandpa's treasure.

Take the control of the little thieves and proceed in the garage, to finish their main quest in this 2-players only game !

Major problem : At night, there is no light in the garage, so you'll have to use a mirror to reflect the only ray of light in this dark place.

But you know, kids are afraid of the dark, so you don't know what could be near you, at any time.

You'll have to be coordinated to control the light, escape the kids' fears, and reach the switch to get the treasure !

CREDITS : 

Project manager :  Anthony Bouraba

Game programmers : Ulysse Raillon - Camille Lavarde - Vincent Pettineo

Game Design & Level Design : François Loing - Allan Claver - David Fernand - William Filipe

Game Art : Yoav Bensadoun - Erwan Élysée

Voice Acting : Gwladys Salou - Anthony Bouraba

Music originally composed by Octave Schlumberger
